mapper.select: SELECT product.product_name AS product_name, user.id AS id, output.unit_price AS unit_price, output.release_quantity AS release_quantity, output.release_date AS release_date, output.confirm_num AS confirm_num, output.confirm_id AS confirm_id, output.status AS status FROM output JOIN product ON output.product_code = product.product_code JOIN user ON output.user_id = user.uid
